Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue blocks or tissue sections on positively charged microscope slides
Purpose: Immunohistochemical detection of MITF in tissue sections to provide high-quality slides for pathologist interpretation.
Container: FFPE tissue block or positively charged microscope slide
Equipment: Microtome, water bath, slide warmer, automated or manual immunostainer, microscope
